name: SonicJ7 Error
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

In this game, You have 8 chances to not turn off your computer.

When it gets to 3 chances, SonicJ7 will turn into Evil Mode.

When it gets to 1 chance, SonicJ7 will turn into SonicJ7.EXE

When it gets to 0 chances, you will get a punishment. After that, the computer will crash. But it's not real, it's just a game.

And then the game will close automatically in 4 to 6 seconds.
